game.synopsis: A story of bravery, selflessness, and courage, as you face the ultimate threat facing your world. With your team at your side and your determination to save your home, you will overcome any obstacle that comes your way. - The final battle is intense, with you and your team fighting against an powerful enemy that threatens to destroy everything in its path. - You must use all of your skills and wits to outmaneuver the enemy and emerge victorious. As you make your final stand for justice and freedom, you will be celebrated by the people of your land.
